Serangan Jantung di Panggung, Calon Kades Meninggal Jelang Pemungutan Suara
02 Nov 2019, 15:17 by Tati Purnawati
MAJALENGKA,(PR).- Salah seorang calon kepala desa di Desa Bantarujeg, Kecamatan Bantarujeg, Kabupaten Majalengka, Ade Zaenal Arifin (56), warga Blok Ciranggon, Desa Bantarujeg, Kecamatan Bantarujeg, Majalengka meninggal menjelang pelaksanaan pemungutan suara, diduga akibat serangan jantung, Sabtu 2 November 2019.
Dia dikabarkan meninggal di atas panggung sekira pukul 08.45 WIB setelah sempat terjadi perselisihan paham di antara kedua calon karena persoalan tempat duduk.
Kapolres Majalengka, Kompol Hidayatullah disertai PS Subbag Humas Polres Majalengka, Aipda Riyana menyebut pada pagi hari sekitar pukul 06.00 WIB Ade Zaenal Arifin yang memiliki nomor urut 2 datang  ke tempat pencoblosan. Dia langsung naik ke panggung dengan menduduki kursi nomor urut 1 milik Agus Bahagia (61).
Selang 15 menit kemudian calon nomor urut 1 Agus Bahagia datang ke lokasi pemungutan suara. Begitu mengetahui tempat duduknya digunakan Ade Zaenal Arifin, dia langsung memprotes panitia 11 atau panitia pemilihan kepala desa yang ada di lokasi.
Atas persoalan tersebut Panitia 11 segera melakukan musyawarah karena terjadi perselisihan paham. Usai melakukan musyawarah tersebut tiba-tiba Ade jatuh pingsan dan pihak panitia segera membawanya ke Puskesmas Bantarujeg yang jaraknya tidak begitu jauh dari lokasi kejadian.
Petugas Puskesmas menyatakan korban telah meninggal dunia diduga akibat serangan jantung. Meninggalnya korban sempat mengegerkan warga termasuk ramai di media sosial hingga sore hari dengan beragam cerita.
Atas meninggalnya korban, Wakapolres Kompol Hidayatullah bersama sejumlah anggotanya dan Camat Bantarujeg sempat melayat ke rumah duka menyampaikan belasungkawa.
Sementara itu pelaksanaan pemilihan kepala desa serentak di Kabupaten Majalengka hingga pukul 18.30 WIB dinyatakan aman. Sejumlah desa hingga malam hari masih berlangsung penghitungan suara.***

Heart Attack on Stage, Prospective Head of Village Passes Ahead of Voting
02 Nov 2019, 15:17 by Tati Purnawati
MAJALENGKA, (PR) .- One of the candidates for the village head in Bantarujeg Village, Bantarujeg District, Majalengka Regency, Ade Zaenal Arifin (56), a resident of the Ciranggon Block, Bantarujeg Village, Bantarujeg District, Majalengka died before the vote, allegedly due to a heart attack , Saturday 2 November 2019.
He reportedly died on stage at approximately 08.45 West Indonesia Time after a dispute between the two candidates occurred due to seat issues.
Majalengka Police Chief, Commissioner Hidayatullah accompanied by Majalengka Police Public Relations Subdivision, Aipda Riyana said that in the morning around 06.00 WIB, Ade Zaenal Arifin, who has sequence number 2, came to the voting place. He immediately went up to the stage by occupying seat number 1 owned by Agus Bahagia (61).
15 minutes later candidate number 1 Agus Bahagia came to the polling station. When he found out that his seat was used by Ade Zaenal Arifin, he immediately protested against the 11th committee or the village head election committee at the location.
With regard to the matter, Committee 11 immediately convened a meeting because of a conflict of understanding. After the meeting, Ade suddenly collapsed and the committee immediately took him to the Bantarujeg Community Health Center which was not too far from the scene.
Puskesmas officials said the victim had died of a suspected heart attack. The death of the victim had a tantrum of residents including busy on social media until the afternoon with a variety of stories.
Upon the death of the victim, Wakapolres Kompol Hidayatullah along with a number of its members and the Bantarujeg Sub-District Head had mourned the condolence house.
Meanwhile the simultaneous village head election in Majalengka Regency until 18:30 WIB was declared safe. A number of villages until the night counting is still ongoing. ***
